title: Full Stack Developer at ARCOS LLC
bulletPoints: Accelerated team delivery by 80% by pioneering agentic coding workflows - subagents, skills, MCP servers, rules, and commands - resulting in faster feature cycles and measurably higher output quality.
Reduced user login time by 70% by implementing a secure biometric authentication system for iOS and Android, resulting in a faster and frictionless experience in a critical mobile application.

title: Full Stack Developer at Oracle
bulletPoints: Reduced log source retrieval latency by 40% by introducing Redis hierarchical cache and lazy loading of nested properties.
Increased log source ingestion throughput by 35% by refactoring Spring Boot pipelines to leverage asynchronous execution and JDBC batch operations.
Optimized page load time by 80% by implementing deferred loading strategies and asynchronous API handling.
Reduced unit test runtime by 95% by introducing a UI-independent testing approach.
Integrated React components into an MVVM architecture, developing reusable implementations adopted across multiple OCI services.
Conducted testing for all added features, including unit, integration, and end-to-end tests.

title: Full Stack Developer at GE Aerospace
bulletPoints: Implemented Java algorithms that reduced employee quality-metrics tracking time by 50%.
Improved REST API performance by ~60% by integrating Elasticsearch, enabling faster and more efficient data retrieval.
Contributed to microservices-based development using Spring Boot and Node.js.
Created and managed ETL processes to centralize data into a data warehouse.
